content: This is true partly because non-Westerners have begun to take pride in their own cultures and partly because those areas of the world where forks are not used have some of the highest birth rates.
translations: ita:Ciò è parzialmente vero perché i non occidentali hanno cominciato ad essere orgogliosi delle loro proprie culture e parz
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Yepthatscool (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
